title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Kevin Roger's Profile
bio: Kevin is a consultant in international logistics and customs. He has developed innovative solutions in the customs and excise space including e-commerce and tax automation.
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>Customs and Trade Compliance</strong>: Kevin has broad knowledge of the customs processes and compliance challenges for companies trading internationally.</li><li><strong>Cross-Border eCommerce</strong>:  Kevin has worked with e-commerce providers to deliver efficient and customs-compliant solutions which meet challenging regulatory requirements for businesses trading internationally.</li><li><strong>Technical Processes</strong>: Kevin’s background and experience enables optimization of  customs processes to enable the best outcomes for businesses and users.</li></ul>
geo: Kevin’s expertise is principally the UK (including Northern Ireland) and the EU. He is located in the UK.
